platformSales.name: Mobile, IP related income, etc.
platformSales.footnote: Includes income from visual content, smart-device content, royalties,and merchandise sales at official stores.

platformSales.name: Dedicated video game platform
platformSales.footnote: Includes hardware (including accessories and amiibo) and, software (including downloadable versions of packaged software, download-only software, add-on content and Nintendo Switch Online)
